item.title: Introducing pytest-r-snapshot: Verifying Python code against R outputs at scale
item.description: An earthy, minimalist display blending textured art with dried and fresh botanicals. Photo by Toa Heftiba. First package in the new year: I’m glad to announce pytest-r-snapshot, a pytest plugin for snapshot testing Python code against reference outputs generated by R. You can install it from PyPI: pip install pytest-r-snapshot If your project uses uv, add it as a development dependency: uv add --dev pytest-r-snapshot Why snapshot testing against R?
